page.title: 07Montrose School in Concert.
page.content: 1985 is{European Music Year.}In this year there are to be many concerts all over Europe to celebrate the 300th. anniversary of the births of Bach, Handel and Scarlatti.As part of the Scottish celebrations there is to be a concert in the{Usher Hall in Edinburgh on June 21st.Each region in Scotland is to perform one item in the concert. Tayside Region is to be represented by {Borrowfield Primary School,Montrose! Thirty two lucky pupils from primaries six and seven have been chosen to form an instrumental group which consists of recorders, xylophones, glockenspiels, chime bars,violins, cellos,double bass and percussion instruments.One of the pieces they will play is a cowboy suite with three sections called "On the Trail""Dogie Lullaby"and"Cattle Train".The school is very proud to be taking part!
